Values.Value: The Ts_AllowBikes field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Bikes are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowBikes field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowBikes NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowDogs field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Dogs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowDogs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowDogs NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowPackAnimals field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether PackAnimals are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowPackAnimals field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowPackAnimals NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowHorses field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Horses are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowHorses field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowHorses NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowOHVs field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.

Research whether OHVs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowOHVs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (10) Prohibited, (20) Allowed - Year Round, (30) Allowed - Seasonally - All Vehicles
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowOHVs NOT IN ( 10 , 20, 30 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowOPDMDs field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether OPDMDs are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowOPDMDs field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowOPDMDs NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether PlatedVehicles are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowPlatedVehicles NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_AllowSnowmobiles field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether Snowmobiles are allowed on each segment and then set the Ts_AllowSnowmobiles field to contain a valid values which is limited to: (1) Yes or (2) No.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_AllowSnowmobiles NOT IN ( 1 , 2 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
Fields Ts_Class and Ts_ClassBreakdown do not match
The value in Fields Ts_Class is mutually exclusive with Ts_ClassBreakdown.
Research the segment(s) and change a value either the Ts_Class or Ts_ClassBreakdown field to match the other.
The Ts_PrimaryName field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the segment(s) name and enter it into the Ts_PrimaryName field.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_PrimaryName IS NULL OR Ts_PrimaryName ='' AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_NationalDesignation field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research whether segment(s) are nationally designated and then set the Ts_NationalDesignation field to contain a valid values.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_NationalDesignation NOT IN (1,2,3,4) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_Class field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the classification segment(s)then set the Ts_Class field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (100) Trail or (200) Road, or (215) Bike Route.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_Class NOT IN (100,200,215) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_Class field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the classification segment(s)then set the Ts_Class field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (100) Trail or (200) Road, or (215) Bike Route.

The Ts_Class field (with a subtype of Tier 3 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the classification segment(s)then set the Ts_Class field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (100) Trail or (200) Road, or (215) Bike Route.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_Class NOT IN (100,200,215) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the primary use of segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_PrimaryUse NOT IN (1,2,3) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the primary use of segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.

The Ts_PrimaryUse field (with a subtype of Tier 3 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the primary use of segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_PrimaryUse NOT IN (1,2,3) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_Surface field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the predominant surface of segment(s) then set the Ts_Surface field to contain vaild a value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_Surface NOT IN (10,20,30,40) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_Surface field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the predominant surface of segment(s) then set the Ts_Surface field to contain vaild a value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_Surface NOT IN (10,20,40,11,30,21,22,12) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_Surface field (with a subtype of Tier 3 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the predominant surface of segment(s) then set the Ts_Surface field to contain vaild a value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_Surface NOT IN (10,20,40,11,30,21,22,12) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_PrimaryName field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the segment(s) name and enter it into the Ts_PrimaryName field.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_PrimaryName IS NULL OR Ts_PrimaryName ='' AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_PrimaryName field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research the segment(s) name and enter it into the Ts_PrimaryName field.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND Ts_PrimaryName IS NULL OR Ts_PrimaryName ='' AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Run the '1.2.1 Set Local Contributor' in the CTS Toolbox.tbx to define who is contributing the data.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk < 10000 OR Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk >99997 OR Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk IS NULL) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Run the '1.2.1 Set Local Contributor' in the CTS Toolbox.tbx to define who is contributing the data.

The Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 3 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Run the '1.2.1 Set Local Contributor' in the CTS Toolbox.tbx to define who is contributing the data.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk < 10000 OR Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk >99997 OR Ts_CTS_ContributorID_fk IS NULL ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_PrimaryPurpose field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with Ts_Class. (All Bike Routes are Connector Paths)
Update Ts_PrimaryPurpose value to be 3 - Connector Path
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Class = 215 AND Ts_PrimaryPurpose <> 3 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1
The Ts_PrimaryPurpose field (with a subtype of Tier 2 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with Ts_Class. (All Bike Routes are Connector Paths)
Update Ts_PrimaryPurpose value to be 3 - Connector Path
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Class = 215 AND Ts_PrimaryPurpose <> 3) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 2
The Ts_PrimaryPurpose field (with a subtype of Tier 3 in CTS_TrailSegments) conflicts with Ts_Class. (All Bike Routes are Connector Paths)
Update Ts_PrimaryPurpose value to be 3 - Connector Path
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Class = 215 AND Ts_PrimaryPurpose <> 3 ) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 3
The Ts_Manager_fk field (with a subtype of Tier 1 in CTS_TrailSegments) does not contain a valid value.
Research what agency manages the segment(s) then set the Ts_Manager_fk field to contain valid a value.
Ts_JoinField <> 999 AND (Ts_Manager_fk < 10000 OR Ts_Manager_fk >99997 OR Ts_Manager_fk IS NULL) AND sTs_Subtype_Tiers = 1

Research the primary use of segment(s) then set the Ts_PrimaryUse field to contain vaild a value which are limited to: (1) Non Mechanized, (2) Non Motorized, (3) Motorized.
